text: Erigeron uniflorus is a Eurasian and North American species of flowering plant in the daisy family known by the common name one-flower fleabane.Flora of North America, Erigeron uniflorus Linnaeus, 1753. One-flower fleabane It is widespread in Arctic and alpine regions in EurasiaAltervista Flora Italiana, Cespica uniflora, Erigeron uniflorus L. includes photos and European distribution mapNaturegate, One-flowered Fleabane Erigeron uniflorusAnnotated Checklist of the Flowering Plants of Nepal, Erigeron uniflorus L. and North America (northern Canada, Alaska, Greenland).Biota of North America Program 2014 state-level distribution map ==References== uniflorus Category:Flora of Europe Category:Flora of North America Category:Flora of Asia Category:Plants described in 1753 Category:Taxa named by Carl Linnaeus
title: Erigeron uniflorus
